Description: Blue glazed steatite scarab, pierced longitudinally, base inscribed with nomen.
Curator's comments: Martin, Egyptian Administrative and Private-Name Seals, no. 443
Bibliographic references: Martin 1971 / Egyptian administrative and private-name seals, principally of the Middle Kingdom and Second Intermediate Period (443)
Condition: fair, glaze worn away, cracked, legs and base chipped
